DOC.brief_summary: What trend change asthmatic patient ' daily peak expiratory flow ( PEF ) variability , pulmonary function , quality life ( QOL ) acupuncture treatment specific acupoints ( CV22 bilateral LU5 , ST40 , BL13 , EXB1 ) compare minimal acupuncture treatment ( sham control group ) non-acupoints , acupuncture treatment ( wait list control group ) ?
DOC.criteria: age 1970 year least 12 % improvement force expiratory volume one second ( FEV1 ) administration short act beta2 agonist . least one typical asthmatic symptom use one routine antiasthmatic medicine acupuncture asthma within 12 month study emergency department visit within one month study hospitalization asthma within three month study severe upper respiratory tract infection within six week study systemic infection , cancer , autoimmune disorder , cardiac failure , myofacial infarct , angina pectoris , renal failure hepatobiliary disease smoke ten cigarette per day
